intro: Polymnia latisquama, commonly known as the broad-squamate polymnia, is a perennial herb native to South America. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in tropical and subtropical regions. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for botanical gardens and shaded landscapes.
